start.title: Real nutrition for real women
start.subtitle: Specialized nutritional support for every stage of your feminine well-being.

summary.top: Benefits of working with me and
summary.bottom: I’ll help you reconnect with your health through food, at every stage of your life.
summary.card_body1: Balance your cycle, energy, and overall well-being through nutrition.
summary.card_body2: Learn to nourish yourself without guilt or extreme diets.
summary.card_body3: Improve your digestion, mood, and daily vitality.
summary.card_body4: Achieve real results without giving up the foods you enjoy.

about.top: Nutritionist and expert in women's health
about.body1: I graduated with a degree in Nutrition and Dietetics, and since then I have been dedicated to supporting women in different stages of their lives: from hormonal balance and the menstrual cycle, to conscious and sustainable eating.
about.body2: I deeply believe in the power of nutrition as a tool for transformation, not only physical, but also emotional. My approach is personalized, without extreme restrictions, based on science, active listening, and education.
about.body3: I am passionate about helping you reconnect with your well-being, feel at peace with your body, and make decisions that make you feel strong, informed, and happy.

services.bottom: I’m here to provide you with the tools and support you need to successfully reach your goals. Explore the services I offer and find the perfect solution for your needs.

card1.card_body: A holistic approach that includes exercises and personalized recipes to boost energy.
card1.card_long1: A personalized session where, in a close and professional manner, we will thoroughly review your eating habits, daily routines, personal preferences, and lifestyle. Based on this information, we will design a nutrition plan completely tailored to you, taking into account not only your physical and health needs, but also your personal goals, overall well-being, and long-term sustainability.
card1.card_long2: The goal is for you to find a healthy balance that fits into your daily life, helps you improve your relationship with food, and allows you to achieve real and lasting results.

card2.card_body: Personalized session to review habits and create a tailored meal plan.
card2.card_long1: A specialized nutrition plan designed to help you balance your menstrual cycle and address possible hormonal imbalances through diet. In this counseling session, we will work on selecting foods that promote hormonal balance, reduce symptoms such as pain, inflammation, or mood swings, and improve your overall well-being.
card2.card_long2: The goal is to provide you with a practical and personalized guide that, through diet, supports the natural regulation of your body and contributes to sustainably improving your quality of life.

card3.card_body: Plan to balance the menstrual cycle or hormonal issues through diet.
card3.card_long1: A holistic approach that combines nutrition with movement, integrating exercises tailored to your level and needs, along with personalized recipes designed to enhance your well-being. Each recommendation is intended to help you maintain a balanced routine that supports both your body and your mind.
card3.card_long2: The goal is that, through healthy habits, you can improve your daily energy, increase your vitality, and strengthen your overall health in a practical and sustainable way over time.

testimonials.bottom: Your well-being is my priority. Each testimonial reflects the commitment, empathy, and dedication I put into every process. Discover how I’ve supported others in transforming their health with a respectful, human, and sustainable approach.
testimonials.testimonial1: In just a few weeks I noticed real changes in my energy, digestion, and mood. I never imagined that small adjustments could make such a big difference.
testimonials.testimonial2: Thanks to her guidance, I finally understood what it means to eat well without obsessing. I learned to enjoy food without guilt and to listen to what my body truly needs.
testimonials.testimonial3: More than a nutritionist, I felt like I had someone who really listened to me. She supported me with empathy throughout the entire process, which made achieving my goals much easier.

footer.top: Because your well-being deserves genuine attention, I support you in nurturing your life with real and sustainable habits.

metadata.title: Real Nutrition for Real Women – María Gracia Yturralde
metadata.description: Specialized nutritional guidance for every stage of your feminine well-being. Balance your hormonal health, your energy, and your relationship with food through a conscious and sustainable approach.
